Actions.Name: Create file
Actions.Description: This operation uploads a file to Azure File Storage.

Actions.Name: Extract archive to folder
Actions.Description: This operation extracts an archive file into a folder (example: .zip).

Actions.Name: Get file content
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves file contents using id.

Actions.Name: Get file content using path
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves file contents using path

Actions.Name: Get file metadata
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves file metadata using file id.

Actions.Name: Get file metadata using path
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves file metadata using path.

Actions.Name: List files
Actions.Description: This operation lists files in a folder.

Actions.Name: Update file
Actions.Description: This operation updates a file in Azure File Storage.
